sentence.Network_en: There is a wide veranda under the overhang of the roof.
sentence.Network_cn: 悬吊的屋顶下是一条宽阔的游廊。

sentence.Network_en: They had their coffee and tea on the veranda.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在阳台上喝咖啡和茶。

sentence.Network_en: Attached to the front of the house, there was a large veranda.
sentence.Network_cn: 房子的正面有一条宽大的游廊。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... onto prep. 到…之上；向…之上 veranda n. 阳台 spirited a. 精神饱满的；生机勃勃的.
...仅有4套，每套面积89平米，拥有一个大游泳池，一个走廊（veranda），阳光躺椅，一个带围墙的热带花园，并可在花园内享受淋浴。
游字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 游览〖 gosightseeing〗 游廊〖 veranda;coveredcorridor〗 游乐〖 pleasure〗.
航海及海运专业术语V(1) ... veranda 走廊 veranda 走廊；凉台 veranda 走廊凉台.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Hindi varandā, from Portuguese varanda 'railing, balustrade'

entry.tran: （房屋外带屋顶的）走廊，游廊,阳台
entry.def: A veranda is a roofed platform along the outside of a house.

example.ex: They had their coffee and tea on the veranda.
example.tran: 他们在阳台上喝咖啡和茶。

means.word_mean: 1. a porch along the outside of a building (sometimes partly enclosed)

sentences.en: She sat in the shade on the veranda.
sentences.cn: 她坐在阳台上的遮荫处。
